name: Baby Storm 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Along with a friend, watch over unpredictable kids as they unleash chaos in your kindergarten! Maintain order, run, clean and feed your way to the highest score!

Platform : PC + Controllers
Engine : Unity  
Number of players :2 

Producer : Axel BAUDE
Game Design : Pierre BOUSSIRA, Pierre RIVIERE
Game Art : Violaine BERTHOUMIEU, Lise HENNEQUIN, Kim NGOUANSAVANH
Game Design & Programming : Adrien BOURDON, Arnaud CHAREL, Chavatanak VING
Music & Sound Design : Malik YAHI
